channel.title: How do you block swearing ingame?
channel.description:
hi is their a way you can block swearing, like a filter so if they say fuck (sorry had to say it) it would block it to be f*** of something?
does anyone no how to do this?
Many Thanks
I james I

item.title: How do you block swearing ingame?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

  1. Add these to player.java
public String GenerateC(int length) {
        String temp = "";
        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
        String te2 = temp;
        temp = te2 + "*";
        }
        return temp;
        }

        public String censorStr(String str)
    {
        String temp = str;
        try
        {
            BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("data/censor.txt"));
            String data = null;
            while ((data = in.readLine()) != null)
            {
                        String temp2 = data;
                        temp = temp.replaceAll(temp2, GenerateC(temp2.length()));
            }
        }
        catch (IOException e)
        {
            System.out.println("Critical error while checking is a censored word");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return temp;

    }
  1. And change your appendPlayerChatText to this
protected void appendPlayerChatText(stream str) {
        str.writeWordBigEndian(((chatTextColor&0xFF) << 8) + (chatTextEffects&0xFF));
        str.writeByte(playerRights);
        str.writeByteC(chatTextSize);        // no more than 256 bytes!!!
        String temp = misc.textUnpack(chatText, chatTextSize);
        String temp2 = censorStr(temp);
        misc.textPack(chatText, temp2);
        str.writeBytes_reverse(chatText, chatTextSize, 0);
    }

And then make file named “censor.txt” to data folder… And put words you want to censor to there.

REMEMBER THIS IS NOT MINE!

IF YOU SAY A BAD WORD YOU CAN SEE IT BUT THE OTHERS CANT MULTI LOG IN TO SEE IT WORK

Read full topic
item.source: How do you block swearing ingame?
